stockmarket.gui.dialog

Class DialogFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • stockmarket.gui.dialog.DialogFactory

  • public class DialogFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory class for creating dialogs in the program.
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    craig

      • createExceptionDialog

        public static mvp.listener.ListenerDialog createExceptionDialog(java.awt.Frame parentFrame,
                                                                java.lang.Throwable t)
        Create a dialog for exceptions that are the result of errors in the program. The exceptions this dialog is intended for are problems with the program that generally should not occur and need to be resolved. Detailed information about the exception is derived from the Throwable parameter, and a full stack trace is provided in the dialog.

        For exceptions caused by user error, that will occur regularly during the normal operation of the program, use createExceptionDialog(Frame,String,String) instead.

        Parameters:
        parentFrame - the frame that owns this dialog.
        t - the exception this dialog is displaying.
        Returns:
        the exception dialog.

      • createExceptionDialog

        public static mvp.listener.ListenerDialog createExceptionDialog(java.awt.Frame parentFrame,
                                                                java.lang.String title,
                                                                java.lang.String message)
        Create a dialog for exceptions that can occur regularly during the operation of the program. These should be used for normal problems that can occur due to user error, and as such should be described in a user-friendly way by the title and message parameters. This should NOT be used for exceptions that are the result of errors in the program, and as such a full stack trace is not provided.
        Parameters:
        parentFrame - the frame that owns this dialog.
        title - the title of the dialog.
        message - the message of the dialog.
        Returns:
        the exception dialog.

      • createOpenPortfolioDialog

        public static mvp.listener.ListenerDialog createOpenPortfolioDialog(java.awt.Frame parentFrame,
                                                                    java.util.List<java.lang.String> portfolioNameList)
        Create a dialog for displaying a list of the names of all saved portfolios, allowing the user to select one to open in the program.
        Parameters:
        parentFrame - the frame that own's this dialog.
        portfolioNameList - the list of portfolio names to display.
        Returns:
        the open portfolio dialog.
